roleset.name: swarm over destructively
roleset.note: OVERRUN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overrun' based on sentences in brown. (from overrun.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: military history
example.text: They overran the 7th Cav's forward machine-gun positions through sheer weight of numbers, over piles of their own dead.
example.arg: over piles of their own dead

example.name: passive
example.text: His sailing vessel is guided by fate to the shores of his own country at a time when [Sibylla's domain]-2 is overrun [*-2]by the armies of one of her rejected suitors.
example.arg: by the armies of one of her rejected suitors
